item.title: GDELT, Missiles, and Image Collection
item.description: -- -- The Global Database of Events, Language, and Tone, or GDELT, is “a realtime network diagram and database of global human society for open research”. The potential for a firehose stream of global data has tantalizing possibilities for research, but concrete examples of work beyond simple evaluations of the database’s capabilities are notably absent… See also: My hasty walkthrough from November 2017, Evaluating GDELT: Syrian Conflict Let’s see how well we can scoop up a set of ballistic missile images using a combination of packages:
